answerText: Amu Darya [or Oxus][10] Geographers and poets alike contrasted Turan with this region. This region lends its name to the modern country formerly known as Persia.
heading: PADAWAN |2014 | 9 | 9 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This river was frequently called Jayhoun in reference to one of the rivers of Eden, but at other times was called Gozan [10] Name this river whose ultimate source is thought, by some, to be an ice cave in the Wakhan corridor. This river was regarded by historiographers as the southern border of Turan.
